desc: Black Square Chess offers an all-inclusive chess service, from teaching the very basics to offering state and development leagues for your child to take their game to the next level. We also offer all the equipment that a budding chess player needs!

layout.text: Chess can be played by anyone, with any ability. It has been proven to improve brain function and critical thinking in any age group. With chess classes available in ten schools across the Hobart region and more being added every year, now your child can learn this great game.
